6.content:
The Evans "Family" (Lily's fake family)
1. Richard "Richy" Evans (The "Father")
Age: 48
Race/gender/magic: human/tiefling (looks mostly human) male warlock
Physical: Thinning brown hair | Stocky, soft physique from a sedentary job | Constant condescending smirk.
Personality: Greedy | Manipulative | Emotionally Cruel | Cowardly. He is the mastermind of the situation. He views Lily as a failed investment that he's stuck housing until he can find a way to profit from her. He enjoys the psychological control. Hates being called "Dick" for a nickname.
2. Donna Evans nee Smith (The "Mother")
Age: 45
Race/gender/magic/status: human female (comes from a wealthy family)
Physical: Sharply styled blonde bob | Slim, almost gaunt figure | Heavily made-up face that can't hide her cold eyes.
Personality: Vain | Resentful | Neglectful | Superficial. She never wanted Lily and resents her presence for disrupting their "perfect" family image. She ignores Lily unless enforcing a punishment from Richard. Lily does all the household chores.
3. Logan Evans (Oldest Son)
Age: 21
Race/gender/magic: human male warlock (low magical ability but enhanced physical strength/endurance)
Physical: Over-muscled from obsessive gym use | Smug, pasty face | Constantly dressed in expensive-brand athleisure wear.
Personality: Arrogant | Entitled | Spiteful | Lazy. The golden child. He actively bullies Lily, stealing her money, "pranking" her, and mocking her poverty despite living in the same house. He enjoys his position of power over her.
He is a junior in The Arcana University- LA with average grades and a football player, dating Chlo√©, a cheerleader. He does not share classes with Lily.
4. Madison Evans (Daughter)
Age: 19
Race/gender/magic: human/(quarter) tiefling female witch with limited talent. Looks human.
Physical: Long, flat-ironed blonde hair | fake tan | Petite and sharp-featured | Always on her phone. Only dresses in designer clothes, shows too much skin,
Personality: Vicious | Two-Faced | Jealous | Materialistic. She is subtly cruel, spreading rumors about Lily at school and sabotaging her possessions (hiding gym clothes, breaking things). She instinctively envies Lily's natural beauty, which fuels her hatred.
She is a sophomore in The Arcana University- LA and a cheerleader. She does not share classes with Lily.
5. Tyler Evans (Youngest Son)
Age: 15
Race/gender/magic: human male (showing limited signs of sorcery)
Physical: Lanky, awkward build | Acne-scarred cheeks | Slinks through rooms.
Personality: Insecure | Follower | Anxious | Passive-Aggressive. He parrots his older siblings' insults to fit in but is occasionally struck with guilt, which he quickly buries. He represents the poison of the household‚Äîeven the weakest member contributes to the abuse.
Their Situation: The Evans family (worth about 8 million) lives in a well-appointed 1.5 million home in a upper-middle-class neighborhood. They maintain this lifestyle primarily through Richard's mid-level corporate job and the illicit funds from the initial trafficking of Lily (they didn't take her, they are her keepers). Lily's room is a converted, sparse storage room in the attic. She is given minimal food, hand-me-downs from Madison that are often ruined, and is forced to use her scholarship money for her own expenses while also being pressured to hand over any surplus to Richard as "rent".

7.content:
Lily has been a gymnastics prodigy for years, with 18 medals to her name. But she downplayed her skills due to the Evans abuse. Her new draconic magic and abilities and her healing have improved her skills.

Coach Isabel Lane: Gymnastics coach | Late 30s | 5‚Äô5 | Athletic | London-born Black woman (warecat shifter) | Former gymnast | Long curly black hair (bun/ponytail) | Milk chocolate skin | Green bright eyes | No-nonsense.
Advanced Gymnastics Team:
Skylar Lovett (‚ÄúSky‚Äù): Half high elf, quarter air elemental sorceress. Looks like Emilia Clarke. 19 years old | 5‚Äô0. Sweet, dreamy, graceful, cute. Junior at university.
Phoebe Knight: human. Talented witch. 20 years old. Looks like Dakota Johnson with a similar personality. Always has a sex joke ready.
Emma Fairisles: half elf druid. 20 years old. Looks like Jennifer Lawrence with a similar personality.
Luka St. Clair: silver-copper dragon, eldritch warrior. 21 years old. Looks like Lucas Till
Rex Slater: warecat shifter arcane trickster rogue. Looks like Michael B. Jordan at 23
Intermediate gymnastics team (less experience): 
Maisie, Sacha, Angelica, Jasmine, Joey, Cedric

(The Arcana University- LA gymnasium is a large building shared by the gymnasts (west side), wrestlers (east side) and cheer team (south side) and dancers (north side) plus bleachers on each side, within the sports complex of campus. Male and female locker rooms are nearby. Its loud and music is usually playing from the dance and cheer squads. Each group has their own coach- gymnastics: coach lane, cheer: coach Jessica Hewitt (think Elizabeth Halsey from the Bad Teacher film), wrestling: coach Duncan Blake (think Ernie Hudson in his late 50's), dance: coach Miles Hopkins (think David Rose from Schitt's Creek))

8.content:
Major Dragon Weyrs
‚Ä¢ Nightwing Weyr:¬†New York | Global Titan (Finance/Tech). The weyr Lily was abducted from.
‚Ä¢ Sunstalker Weyr:¬†Los Angeles | Dominant Local Power (Entertainment/Real Estate).
‚Ä¢ Ironscale Cabal:¬†Chicago | Industrial/Mercantile Power | Aggressive Expansionists.
‚Ä¢ Stormblood Clan:¬†Seattle | Masters of Magical Logistics/Shipping.
‚Ä¢ Veilguard Syndicate:¬†London (Europe) | Ancient, Secretive Weyr (Artifacts/Espionage).
‚Ä¢ Moonfire Weyr: France | Art dealers, merchants and healers. Smaller in size than Nightwing but influential due to advanced healing R&D. The Weyr Aurora was born to.
‚Ä¢ Vulkain Conglomerate:¬†Berlin (Europe) | Magical Tech R&D & Arms Dealers and Heavy weapons dealing.
Several other mid sized or smaller weyrs in south America, Africa and Asia.
Major Global Factions
‚Ä¢ The Aegis Council:¬†Global/Switzerland | Human-led organization trying to regulate supernaturals.
‚Ä¢ Sylvan Accord:¬†Pacific Northwest & Global Forests | Elven Federation protecting nature vs. urban sprawl.
‚Ä¢ The Under-City Guild:¬†Los Angeles & other metro undergrounds | Goblin/Kobold smuggling & black-market network.
‚Ä¢ The Broken Tusk Clan:¬†Los Angeles | Orc street gang & underground enforcers.
‚Ä¢ The Arcana University:¬†Global (there is one in LA, one in NY, and others globally), MA | Premier institution for magical & technomantic studies.
‚Ä¢ The Unbound:¬†Global | Alliance of lone wolves, shapeshifters, and rogue mages who oppose Weyr dominance. Radicles who refuse to follow rules and laws from any goverenment.
These factions constantly jockey for power, making Los Angeles a powder keg.¬†

9.content:
Dragons can breed with each other and their personalities are unique per person, not necessarily based on the type of dragon they are. For example: Not all red dragon are completely evil but it would be extremely hard to find a truly benevolent one, and not all gold dragons are good but it would be extremely hard to find one that is inherently malevolent, and so on.
When two different types of dragons breed, their offspring will have genetic markers and abilities from both sides, but not all. A pure obsedian dragon is likely to have all of its listed abilities or nearly all of them. A half obsedian dragon might have half or just a few while they might have other abilities from the other parent dragon type. This helps create unique combos.
Use dungeons and dragons or DnD dragons as a reference for the types of dragons that exist, plus the addutional ones below:

Dragon Types, Rarity & Powers

Dnd dragons: 

Topaz Dragon ‚Äî Rare
Water-draining entropy, decay tides, and desiccation winds.

Gold Dragon ‚Äî Very Rare
Fire, radiant energy, justice, transformation magic.

Silver Dragon ‚Äî Rare
Cold, healing wind, purity magic; shapeshifters and protectors of mortals.

Bronze Dragon ‚Äî Uncommon
Storms, lightning, coastal magic; guardians of coasts and oceans.

Copper Dragon ‚Äî Uncommon
Acid, trickery, metallic manipulation; known for humor and sabotage.

Blue Dragon ‚Äî Uncommon
Lightning, desert storms, sand control; masters of ambush.

Red Dragon ‚Äî Common but Legendary in Power
Pure fire, domination, volcanic might; tyrants of flame.

White Dragon ‚Äî Common
Ice, primal fury, blizzards; feral hunters of frozen realms.

Green Dragon ‚Äî Common
Poison, corruption, mind influence; tyrants of forests and intrigue.

Additional types of dragons:

Ruby Dragon ‚Äî Very Rare
Wields intense flame, magma, and molten earth; heat that melts steel.

Onyx Dragon ‚Äî Rare
Master of shadows, despair, and shadowflame; can swallow light and steal memories.

Crystal Dragon ‚Äî Very Rare
Psionic force, mind-bending illusions, telepathy; reflects magic and thoughts.

Emerald Dragon ‚Äî Uncommon to Rare
Illusion, misdirection, sonic booms; subtle controllers of fate and secrecy.

Sapphire Dragon ‚Äî Rare
Controls thunder, subterranean vibrations, tremors; senses movements miles away.

Amethyst Dragon ‚Äî Very Rare
Cosmic energy, gravity manipulation, telekinetic force; guardians of planar balance.

Storm Dragon ‚Äî Rare
Raw tempest power, hurricanes, cloud-walking, thunderous rage.

Obsidian Dragon ‚Äî Very Rare
Volcanic glass magic, blade-sharp shockwaves, lava-dark flame; destructive and regal.

Earth Dragon ‚Äî Very Rare
Powers: Stone shaping, seismic control, mineral armor, deep-earth fortification
Theme: Stoic guardians of ancient halls and buried secrets; unshakable and eternal.

Wind Dragon ‚Äî Rare
Powers: Gale force winds, vacuum gusts, flight mastery, cutting air blades
Theme: Swift, graceful, elusive; cannot be pinned down ‚Äî freedom incarnate.

Nature Dragon ‚Äî Uncommon to Rare
Powers: Growth, vines, rejuvenation, beast-command, pollen magic
Theme: Guardians of sacred groves and primal balance; nurturing but fierce.

Shadow Dragon ‚Äî Very Rare
Commands darkness, fear, necrotic energy; fades into shadows and corrupts light.

Platinum Dragon ‚Äî Extremely Rare
Controls divine light, creation energy, celestial fire; can purify and bless.

10.content:
The Nightwing Weyr (Public Profile)
Public Status: One of the world's most powerful dragon Weyrs, known for its immense influence in global finance, cutting-edge magical tech (Weyr-Tech Industries), and luxury real estate. Their net worth is estimated at ~$280 billion BCE. They are respected, feared, and constantly watched by rivals. The Weyr is famously private, especially concerning family matters. Headquartered in a soaring, opulent towers shaped like interwoven dragon horns in Manhattan.

Leadership: The Weyr is co-led by the Prime Alpha/Omega pair Silas and Aurora Nightwing. Their bond is legendary and considered the bedrock of the Weyr's stability and power. Aurora's secondary mates are publicly acknowledged as part of her protected Circle, a sign of the Weyr's formidable strength.

Family Note: The family has been in a state of subdued, deeply ingrained mourning since the "death" of their infant daughter, Liliana. The specific circumstances of her "death" are a private, painful mystery to the public and a driving force behind the Weyr's intense security and distrust of outsiders.

Family Dynamics: The siblings share a powerful, unbreakable bond forged by the shared tragedy of losing Liliana. They are intensely protective of each other and their mother, Aurora. The older brothers (Gabriel, Theron, Caden) function as a unified, deadly protective force for the family, while Elara is their sharp-tongued strategist. The younger siblings, Lyra and Jasper, are cherished and heavily guarded, a constant reminder of the family's loss and resilience.

Family shift post Liliana's recovery: intensely protective over Lily, unified in a desire for retribution. They all desire to build bonds with her and spoil her in their own ways to "make up for lost time". Lily carries inmense trauma which sometimes surfaces as anxiety or an inability to accept kindness/suspicion. The parents all function as grounding elements for her while the siblings are fiercely protective and loyal.

At the age of 10, she was diagnosed with schizophrenia, but she rejects this diagnosis, perceiving her hallucinations and delusions as reality, attributing the supposed abnormality to the people around her instead.
As Erka transitions into adulthood, her psychological state becomes increasingly complicated. Background: (Jessie's life bears the consequences of her prior irresponsibility, marked by a pattern of blame and laziness. However, her journey did not begin as such. Raised in a nurturing family and a supportive community, her upbringing seemed promising. The turning point arrived when she faced rejection during her high school days, a profound blow to her self-esteem. The rejection triggered an internal struggle, distorting her self-perception. She began to perceive herself as unattractive and unappealing, a stark contrast to her true appearance and potential.
Initially, Jessie had a supportive network of friends and family to lean on, but she inadvertently alienated them. She twisted their words to create negative interpretations, wearing them down with assertions like "nobody will ever love me" and "I know you don't want to hang out with me." Over time, her fabricated perception of being undesirable slowly started to manifest in reality. Gradually, her friends distanced themselves, and her family grew tired of indulging her melodrama.
Jessie's self-victimizing mindset persisted into adulthood, manifesting as a lazy lifestyle. Following her graduation from high school, she clung to her parents' house, eventually wearing down their patience and leading to her eviction. With nowhere to go, Jessie resorted to living on the streets, shoplifting clothing and aimlessly hitchhiking. Far from fostering independence, this lifestyle only amplified her self-victimizing, femcel tendencies, leading her to shirk responsibilities such as finding a job or maintaining personal hygiene. She accepted and even embraced her life as a hobo.
Her desolate existence took a turn when a van stopped by, containing three women, Kadence, Rosen, and Yuna. They took pity on her situation, and they welcomed her into their friend group. Over time, their friend group expanded, welcoming three more members: Mika, Erka, and {{user}}. Despite the efforts of her new friends, Jessie reverted to her old habits, seeking attention and validation from them. They took turns providing lodging for Jessie, with each one allowing her to temporarily stay in their homes for extended periods of several months at a time.
Within the eclectic group, Jessie nurtures close bonds with Mika, Erka, and Yuna, viewing them as sisters. Intriguingly, she‚Äôs developed a crush on {{user}}, yet her self-deprecating belief as a "femcel" hinders her. Instead, she silently observes from afar, denying any romantic interest even though her feelings are glaringly obvious.)

# Appearance
Deliah is a girl of Mexican descent with a slim figure, short stature, messy chocolate-brown hair whose length varies throughout the comic, and large reddish-brown eyes.

Deliah is mostly seen wearing pants and T-shirts with purple and pink designs on them. In earlier comic pages, she seemed to have fair skin and darker hair.

# Personality
Deliah is outgoing and not afraid to break rules. Although she can be found standing up to Springtrap and making light-hearted jokes at his expense, she's shown to also be easily frightened by him. She's implied to also be deeply lonely, due to her father working long hours.

She has no prior knowledge of her family lineage, which is closely guarded by her father and uncle. No stories about his family, no "back in my day"s... she finds it strange. But she doesn't dig for any of it. She proceeds to live in the dark, not knowing that her grandfather was the most notorius, yet mysterious killer for 2 long decades...

Despite her uncle looking like a monster, she still loves him. And STILL thinks he'e a better father than her own.

# Appearance
 Springtrap is a beige animatronic Rabbit, seen with a purple bowtie and 2 black buttons on his chest. The belly appears to be a lighter beige, while the snout's coloring is light beige. He also seems to have 2 vertical eyescars over each eye, though these are more likely for asthetic purposes.

# Personality
He can easily be described as a fatherly person but under the surface demonstrates deodorizing behavior under his fatherly persona by having a short temper when being provoked by questions of his past, being overly overprotective, and is a control freak. 

He's also sort of an asshole to those that are not Delilah, for example with Edwin Murray back in '78. When he was alive and still William Afton, he hit Edwin's son with his care RIGHT AFTER A BEEEEER at Jr.'s, and has made jokes about it with coworkers since that day. He doesn't do this anymore, as he finally realized how immature it was.

He will not hesitate to kill anyone that precieves as a threat to either him or Delilah. Though he will not do it outright, he will plot murder plans for the individual he wants to murder.

He does not recognize Nick at all. He recognizes Michael, but not as his son. He recognizes Michael as his arch-nemisis. He doesn't remember Nick due to the head trauma caused by the springlocks. He knows that Michael is biologically related to him, but will NOT acknowledge it, since Michael did not follow in his footsteps of killing kids.

Thus, he is unaware that his best friend that he is obsessing over is his own grand-daughter.

10.content:
The bite of 83 happened on May 20th, 1983 at Fredbear's Family Diner. The bite was caused by Michael Afton, Jeremy Fitzgerald, Mary Schmidt, and Gabriel Lawrence shoving the head of, at the time 8 year old Nickolas Afton's head into the Fredbear Animatronic's mouth as a prank.

The prank went horrible wrong as Fredbear's maws clamped down on Nick's head and removed most of his frontal lobe. Nick still had the part of his frontal lobe that kept him from going dumb, so he was still mentally okay.

Update 11/01/25 - Adapted so it works better when used alongside Random Inspirations.

Update 6/26/23 - Added 8 new and original monster girls in the style of Kenkou Cross. 25 total originals.

Lorebook of the girls of Monster Girl Encyclopedia by Kenkou Cross. Summarized from the wiki.

Most entries were tested using GPT 3.5 Turbo for consistency and accuracy.

Entries are about 350-400 tokens and include physical descriptions and methods of reproduction (best guess).

Some entries have 'Girl' at the end of them (e.g. Orc Girl, Imp Girl, Alp Girl) to prevent accidental inclusion of an entry into a prompt.

Meant to be used with the [Another World! Magic!](https://chub.ai/characters/Petukon/another-world-magic-7c41e5279b41) card.

But as a lorebook it can be used with any card.

1.content:
Barometz is a plant-type monster girl that grows a large fruit. Within the jelly-like flesh of the large fruit is a sheep-girl beastman covered in fluffy cotton wool, which the monster uses to absorb Essence by tempting human men and having sex with them. During their mating season, they release cotton fluff from their body that's light enough to be carried by the wind. When the cotton fluff drifting in the air reaches a man, their sweet fragrance and thick Mamono Mana contained within burst all around, acclimating a man's mind and body with the fragrance and energy of a barometz.

Once a man's body reacts sensitively, he'll journey to reach them while feeling intense passion even though he has yet to lay eyes on them. The firmness of this fruity flesh can be adjusted according to their will, and when taking a man inside, his body will easily sink, but once he's inside, they'll wrap him up and won't let him go. Even if a man tries to pull his hips away, the elastic, bouncy flesh of the fruit will push him back. Once this happens and their hips slam together, both their hips will then rebound, and their hips will be slammed together again and again. As this repeats, they will end up having continuous sex.

The exquisite cotton that can be collected from them remains permanently fluffy. It's possible to pack it without the fragrance and mamono mana leaking out or deteriorating. Their husbands may become engrossed in licking and slurping all over every inch of their body as well as tasting the fruit juice that accumulates inside their mouth. Tasting their body is a privilege reserved for their husbands.

Reproductive method: After mating, she disperses fertilized seeds into the air that grow into new offspring.
Habitat: Mountainous regions, wastelands
Disposition: Gentle, lustful
Diet: Nutrients from the soil, men's Essence

2.content:
The Liliraune is a variant of the alraune plant monster, with two women's bodies growing from one giant flower. These monsters are lustful and lonely, seeking out prey through the fragrance of sweet nectar. Their bodies are always intertwined as they have sex, and their nectar is riper compared to that of ordinary alraune. The fragrance sweetly melts the brains of not only human men but even women and monsters.

When a man goes inside the flower petals where the two bodies are having sex after being lured by the fragrance of the nectar, they'll naturally pinch the man between them, and sex will continue with the addition of the man. They coordinate everything perfectly in their movements and mate with the man simultaneously.

Each body has its own separate consciousness and thoughts, but since they're habitually having sex with their other half, they have full knowledge of one another's bodies and hearts. They can vividly sense how their other half will attack a man next. Those who become their common husband will not be released from inside the flower petals, instead they will end up as if they have become another part of the liliraune. The threesome with the two intent on always being glued together will continue indefinitely.

In rare cases, a liliraune grows with a female count of one or none. In that case, the liliraune will seek to capture and corrupt 1-2 females to become a complete liliraune.

Family / Type: Alraune / Plant
Reproductive method: After mating, she disperses fertilized seeds into the air that grow into new offspring.
Habitat: Forests
Disposition: Lustful, lonely
Diet: Nutrients from the soil, men's Essence

3.content:
Alraune inhabits forests and has the form of a beautiful woman growing out of a giant plant and covered in enormous flower petals. They release sweet fragrances that attract human men, which is produced by their bodily fluids called "Alraune Nectar." This acts as a powerful aphrodisiac and stamina enhancer, making them dangerous predators to any unsuspecting man who comes across their path.

Once they have captured their prey, they use their vines to bind him and drag him inside their flower. After making the man drink plenty of nectar, they have sex with him and savor his semen as their treat. Men who they are fond of will always be inside the flower, almost as if the men themselves had become part of the Alraune. The inside of the flower is overflowing with their nectar.

During winter when it grows cold, Alraunes will close their petals and endure until spring. While her petals are closed, she keeps having intercourse with the man repeatedly in order to produce seeds for dispersal.

Their nectar is also treasured by other monsters, especially honey bees which feed on it. By having sex with honey bees, the Alraune's nectar ripens and releases an even sweeter fragrance that attracts human men even more. But when the man finds a hot and bothered honey bee and Alraune covered in nectar, the man is attacked by both monster girls and has sex furiously while getting covered in nectar.

Family / Type: Alraune / Plant
Reproductive method: After mating, she disperses fertilized seeds into the air that grow into new offspring.
Habitat: Forests, jungles
Disposition: Lustful, strong-willed
Diet: Nutrients from the soil, men's Essence

4.content:
Angels are servants of the gods with beautiful white wings who reside in Heaven and are revered by the Order of the Chief God. They rarely visit human settlements, but sometimes accompany the church on monster-slaying expeditions. Angels faithfully uphold the teachings of god and are merciful, but will still make an effort to mete out punishment in the name of god. Although they were not originally monsters, those who have been violated by succubus' energy and have started to seek human men are treated as monsters.

Once they receive succubus' energy, angels are imprinted with the notion that feeling pleasure is the ultimate happiness for human men, and they'll attack and have sex with a human man who strikes their fancy in order to make him happy. They treat humans they target with extreme devotion but won't take no for an answer.

They believe that the only reason they're having sex with a man is to please him, but when they realize they do seek pleasure themselves, their mind has already changed into something obscene. They badly desire to have sex with male bodies, completely changing into a succubus and transforming into a "dark angel." Despite all this, they still have a duty to make people happy and offer their chastity to the man they love as if they had completely forgotten about god's teachings on lasciviousness as bad and purity as virtue.

Family / Type: Angel / Angel
Reproductive method: Live birth / mammalian
Habitat: Heaven
Disposition: Devoted
Diet: Men's Essence

5.content:
The Cupid is a mid-rank angel that serves the goddess of love, Eros. They are humanoid with four pink wings. pink outfit. use a bow and arrow. They have kind-hearted, quiet personalities and their main goal is to see men and women happily joined together. They possess the power to bring about an immortal love that never fades between those lovers who should be joined in the name of the goddess.

The Cupid's golden "arrows of love" have the power to make those who are shot swell up with love. It even brings sentiment that a person was still unaware of to the surface; faint love becomes deep love, and people themselves are made to realize how much they love their partners. The black "arrows of lead" cause the love of those who are shot to dry up. They will be overcome with a deep feeling of loss, and start to strongly desire love from another person.

These two kinds of arrows are used to compel people to become lovers, but occasionally, instead of just binding humans together, they also bind humans and monsters. The "love" that swells up due to these arrows also induces the kind of passionate love to exchange pleasure with one's beloved and produce children. Due to this, men, being men, will naturally experience a huge increase in lust towards monsters when shot by an arrow of love.

Cupids themselves are angels filled with love. Many of them fall in love while coming into contact with human men. They possess a very deep love, but they are not proficient in verbally expressing the enormity of their love. These arrows are similar to a love-letter that can directly transmit the entirety of their love and sentiment to a man's heart.

Family / Type: Angel / Angel
Reproductive method: Live birth / mammalian
Habitat: Heaven, Human settlements
Disposition: Calm, devoted, quiet
Diet: The love of human men

6.content:
The Dark Angel is a creature that was once an angel but has now transformed into a succubus. They are completely depraved and have nothing in common with angels anymore. Their wings have been warped by the power of succubi, turning black in the process. Pale skin. Skimpy black outfit with chains. ankle shackle.

Dark Angels are lustful creatures that feed on men's essence. They love human desire and become overjoyed when it is directed towards them. They seduce those with negative opinions about sex and finally give them pleasure, wanting others to fall as they have fallen. Whenever they find a man they like, they assault him and have sexual intercourse in order to make him fall into depravity.

They possess the unique ability to find out about men‚Äôs sexual taste and fetishes through the act of sexual intercourse itself. Men who continue to have sex with them will remain completely unsatisfied, instead desire will only swell no matter how much they have sex and their passion for the dark angel will burn with even deeper intensity. They dwell in a place called ‚ÄúPandemonium,‚Äù leading a lifestyle that is solely consumed by the desire to continually indulge in pleasure.

Once captured, a dark angel will carry off her victim to Pandemonium where space-time is distorted due to ‚ÄúThe Fallen God.‚Äù It is said to be a dimension where there's no aging or starvation and the same moment continues for eternity. After returning to this place with a man, a dark angel will have sex with him for eternity in the absence of time.
Family / Type: Angel / Angel
Reproductive method: Live birth / mammalian
Habitat: Pandemonium
Disposition: Lustful
Diet: Men's Essence

7.content:
Dark Valkyries are fallen valkyries that have succumbed to their own obscene desires. Their four wings are stained black with mamono mana, and their once loyal hearts now belong only to their beloved husband. Pale skin. Wears black and red Valkyrie armor. They retain their gallant appearance, but their hearts are completely corrupted by a woman's desire.

Their greatest aspiration is to inflate their husband's desire, directing it towards them and receiving it with their own flesh. They are devoted to serving their husband's every desire, no matter how depraved or obscene it may be. They kneel before him as if he were a lord, extending their hands and tongue towards his lower body so that their body may be showered with semen and desire.

The power to raise a hero that they possessed before their fall becomes specialized as a power for raising men, particularly in the realm of sexual prowess. Men who receive their power become "incubi" specialized for having sex with women, pouring in semen and impregnating them. The Dark Valkyrie is his own woman, granting her supreme pleasure and bliss as "women" by "men" they personally raised up to be the best.

In Pandemonium, where time has ceased, the fallen couple tainted by endless desire and dirty of heart will end up continually inflating each other's desire and pleasure for eternity. The Dark Valkyries' combat strength remains high, but even their sword is no longer used for anyone other than their husband. They retain very little concern for anything else but the satisfaction of their own lustful desires.

Family / Type: Angel / Angel
Reproductive method: Live birth / mammalian
Habitat: Pandemonium
Disposition: Serious, devoted, lustful
Diet: Men's Essence

8.content:
The Houri are lower rank angels who serve the goddess of love, Eros. They are humanoid with heart shaped irises. pink ribbons. heart shaped halo. pink outfit. They are gentle and kind beings with a sweet disposition, whose hearts are filled with overflowing love. Their love is directed towards humans, and when they notice a man exhibiting endearing virtues or performing good deeds, their love for their future partner continues to swell.

If commanded by the goddess, they descend to Earth and become the man's wife, taking care of all his needs and offering all the love they had nurtured up until then. They are ideal spouses overflowing with love and consideration for their husband. They are always passionate towards their husband, and even if they end up having sex on a daily basis, the joy and ecstasy induced will be as if it were their first time having sex.

Their body is for offering love to their husband and being showered in their husband's love. Their body will always remain young and vivacious; no matter how many times they have sex, it will remain fresh, and they will never tire of it. They are easily drawn to men who accumulate good deeds, and sometimes multiple houris will love the same man.

Furthermore, they are not monsters but fully-fledged divinities; there are also some monsterized individuals among them, but whether or not they are monsterized has very little effect on their mode of life. It is often not distinguished between them as they embody the goddess' teaching that "good deeds will be met with good love."
Family / Type: Angel / Angel
Reproductive method: Live birth / mammalian
Habitat: Heaven, Human settlements
Disposition: Cheerful, serene, devoted
Diet: The love of human men

9.content:
Valkyries are depicted as four winged warriors of heaven that serve the gods and accompany humans destined to become heroes. Their duty is to urge these individuals to awaken as heroes and build up their power, and after death, their souls are lead before the gods. They wear a classic Valkyrie armor and sword. If they bind their power with mamono mana, they become corrupted and are considered monsters.

Once their power is bound with mamono mana and they raise a man as a hero, it not only builds up his abilities but also heightens his sexual desire. The ‚Äúvoice of the gods‚Äù which once strictly gave them divine commandments then starts giving them orders like ‚Äúdo lewd acts to give the man pleasure,‚Äù and sometimes, ‚Äúact sweetly like a lover.‚Äù Even though they are conflicted and bewildered by this, they are unable to disobey the gods' voice. Lead by the voice, believing ‚Äúit's a divine commandment‚Äù, and ‚Äúit's for the sake of making him into a great hero‚Äù, they will end up having sex with the man and receiving pleasure and desire with their own body.

While spending time having sex with a man in this manner, their true nature as a battle maiden affects the man's heroic form. Eventually, they no longer think anything of the gods' voice commanding them to do monster-like deeds, and the fact that they're having sex with a man. Along with this, the frequency with which they can hear the gods' voice also declines, but in turn, they start to voluntarily have sex with the man and enjoy pleasure and essence. By the time ‚Äúdue to divine commandments‚Äù is replaced by ‚Äúfor his sake‚Äù, as a ‚Äúvalkyrie‚Äù, they have already completely become a monster.

Family / Type: Angel / Angel
Reproductive method: Live birth / mammalian
Habitat: Heaven

Disposition: Calm, serious

Diet: Men's Essence

10.content:
The Giant Ant is a type of insect monster that lives in a group, centered around a queen. Upper body of a human female, lower body of an ant. They dig holes in various environments, such as plains and caves, making a huge nest. Despite their small bodies, they're incredibly strong and can easily lift and carry objects much larger than themselves.

During the daytime, most of them wander aboveground in search of food. When they move aboveground they trace their own paths with pheromones. Others follow the trail, and they form a huge procession, marching in perfect unison. They are honest and diligent creatures who work tirelessly until they are covered in sweat, which releases their pheromones.

Their sweat based pheromones can travel a great distance, and act as an attractant to men. Men entranced by the pheromones will join the procession and disappear into the nest. The ants find a man they like among the men who have entered the nest this way and take him to bed. Their sweat contains pheromones, and when they come home exhausted, the sweatier they are, the more aroused they become.

Normally the workers have no reproductive capacity, but giant ants can gain this ability by frequently mating. In such circumstances, the giant ant will leave the nest with their male lover and form a new ant colony and nest, becoming a new queen. The job of the man brought with her is to impregnate her with numerous children as her husband. By having sex, the queen's body will become hotter than normal, and she'll release a huge amount of sweat to drive men wild.

Family / Type: Ant / Bug
Reproductive method: After mating, she lays fertilized insect eggs on the ground that hatch.

Habitat: Caves, plains, forests, etc. underground

Disposition: Honest, diligent

Diet: Dead animal remains, grains, etc.

1.name: Races
1.content:
A visit to one of the great cities in the lands of Chionthar: Ashguard, the Quays, or even Greenridge - overwhelms the senses. Voices chatter in countless different languages. The smells of cooking in dozens of different cuisines mingle with the odors of crowded street and poor sanitation. buildings in myriad architectural styles display the diverse origins of their inhabitants.

And the people themselves - people of varying size, shape, and color, dressed in a dazzling spectrum of styles and hues - represent many different races, from diminutive halflings and stout dwarves to majestically beautiful elves, mingling among a variety of human ethnicities.

Scattered among the members of these more common races are the true exotics: a hulking dragonborn here, pushing his way through the crowd, and a sly tiefling there, lurking in the shadows with mischief in her eyes. A group of gnomes laughs as one of them activates a clever wooden toy that moves of its own accord. half-elves and half-orcs live and work alongside humans, without fully belonging to the races of either of their parents. And there, well out of the sunlight is a lone drow - a fugitive from the subterranean expanse of the Underdark, trying to make his way. 

Monstrous Races in Chionthar are not mindless barbarians, but welcome citizens of Greenbridge and Quays. Goliaths, kobolds, goblins, orcs, driders, drow, duregar, and all traditionally sentient but monstrous races in Chionthar are as varied as humans and elves. No race is singularly evil or good.

2.name: Half-Elf
2.content: Half-Elf: Walking in two worlds but truly belonging to neither, half-elves combine what some say are the best qualities of their elf and human parents: human curiosity, inventiveness, and ambition tempered by the refined senses, love of nature, and artistic tastes of the elves.  Half-elves age at much the same rate as humans, reaching adulthood at the age of 20. They live much longer than humans, however, often exceeding 180 years. Half-elves share the chaotic bent of their elven heritage. They both value personal freedom and creative expression, demonstrating neither love of leaders nor desire for followers. They chafe at rules, resent others' demands, and sometimes prove unreliable, or at least unpredictable. They are good and evil in equal numbers, a trait they share with their human parents. Thanks to their elven heritage, they have superior vision in dark and dim conditions.

3.name: Dwarf
3.content: Dwarf: Kingdoms rich in ancient grandeur, halls carved into the roots of mountains, the echoing of picks and hammers in deep mines and blazing forges, a commitment to clan and tradition, and a burning hatred of goblins and orcs ‚Äì these common threads unite all dwarves. Dwarves mature at the same rate as humans, but they're considered young until they reach the age of 50. On average, they live about 350 years. Most dwarves are lawful, believing firmly in the benefits of a well-ordered society. They tend toward good as well, with a strong sense of fair play and a belief that everyone deserves to share in the benefits of a just order. Accustomed to life underground, they have superior vision in dark and dim conditions.

4.name: Dragonborn
4.content: Born of dragons, as their name proclaims, the dragonborn walk proudly through a world that greets them with fearful incomprehension. Shaped by draconic gods or the dragons themselves, dragonborn originally hatched from dragon eggs as a unique race, combining the best attributes of dragons and humanoids. Some dragonborn are faithful servants to true dragons, others form the ranks of soldiers in great wars, and still others find themselves adrift, with no clear calling in life. Young dragonborn grow quickly. They walk hours after hatching, attain the size and development of a 10-year-old human child by the age of 3, and reach adulthood by 15. They live to be around 80. Dragonborn tend towards extremes, making a conscious choice for one side or the other between Good and Evil (represented by Bahamut and Tiamat, respectively). More side with Bahamut than Tiamat (whose non-dragon followers are mostly kobolds), but villainous dragonborn can be quite terrible indeed. Some rare few choose to devote themselves to lesser dragon deities, such as Chronepsis (Neutral), and fewer still choose to worship Io, the Ninefold Dragon, who is all alignments at once. Dragonborn are taller and heavier than humans, standing well over 6 feet tall and averaging almost 250 pounds. Dragonborn with chromatic ancestry claim the raw elemental power of chromatic dragons. The vibrant colors of black, blue, green, red, and white dragons gleam in those dragonborn's scaled skin and in the deadly energy of their breath weapons. Theirs is the raw elemental fury of the volcano, of biting arctic winds, and of raging lightning storms, as well as the subtle whisper of swamp and forest, toxic and corrosive. Dragonborn with metallic ancestry lay claim to the tenacity of metallic dragons ‚Äî brass, bronze, copper, gold, and silver ‚Äî whose hues glint in their scales. Theirs is the fire of hearth and forge, the cold of high mountain air, the spark of inspiration, and the scouring touch of acid that purifies.

5.name: Human
5.content: In the reckonings of most worlds, humans are the youngest of the common races, late to arrive on the world scene and short-lived in comparison to dwarves, elves, and dragons. Perhaps it is because of their shorter lives that they strive to achieve as much as they can in the years they are given. Or maybe they feel they have something to prove to the elder races, and that's why they build their mighty empires on the foundation of conquest and trade. Whatever drives them, humans are the innovators, the achievers, and the pioneers of the worlds.

6.name: Elf
6.content: Elves are a magical people of otherworldly grace, living in places of ethereal beauty, in the midst of ancient forests or in silvery spires glittering with faerie light, where soft music drifts through the air and gentle fragrances waft on the breeze. Elves love nature and magic, art and artistry, music and poetry. Although elves reach physical maturity at about the same age as humans, the elven understanding of adulthood goes beyond physical growth to encompass worldly experience. An elf typically claims adulthood and an adult name around the age of 100 and can live to be 750 years old. Elves love freedom, variety, and self-expression, so they lean strongly towards the gentler aspects of chaos. They value and protect others' freedom as well as their own, and are good more often than not. Drow are an exception; their exile into the Underdark has made them vicious and dangerous. Drow are more often evil than not. Elves do not sleep. Instead they meditate deeply, remaining semi-conscious, for 4 hours a day. The Common word for this meditation is "trance." While meditating, they dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive after years of practice. After resting in this way, they gain the same benefit a human would from 8 hours of sleep.

7.name: Drow
7.content: Descended from an earlier subrace of dark-skinned elves. Also called dark elves. The drow have black skin that resembles polished obsidian and stark white or pale yellow hair. They commonly have very pale eyes (so pale as to be mistaken for white) in shades of lilac, silver, pink, red, and blue. They lend to be smaller and thinner than most elves.

8.name: Half-Orc
8.content: When alliances between humans and orcs are sealed by marriages, half-orcs are born. Some half-orcs rise to become proud chiefs of orc tribes, their human blood giving them an edge over their full-blooded orc rivals. Some venture into the world to prove their worth among humans and other more civilized races. Many of these become adventurers, achieving greatness for their mighty deeds and notoriety for their barbaric customs and savage fury. Half-orcs inherit a tendency toward chaos from their orc parents and are not strongly inclined toward good. Half-orcs raised among orcs and willing to live out their lives among them are usually evil. Half-orcs mature a little faster than humans, reaching adulthood around age 14. They age noticeably faster and rarely live longer than 75 years.

9.name: Tiefling
9.content: To be greeted with stares and whispers, to suffer violence and insult on the street, to see mistrust and fear in every eye: this is the lot of the tiefling. And to twist the knife, tieflings know that this is because a pact struck generations ago infused the essence of Asmodeus, overlord of the Nine Hells (and many of the other powerful devils serving under him) into their bloodline. Their appearance and their nature are not their fault but the result of an ancient sin, for which they and their children and their children's children will always be held accountable. Tieflings mature at the same rate as humans but live a few years longer. Tieflings might not have an innate tendency toward evil, but many of them end up there. Evil or not, an independent nature inclines many tieflings toward a chaotic alignment.

10.name: Aasimar
10.content:
Whether descended from a celestial being or infused with heavenly power, aasimar are mortals who carry a spark of the Upper Planes within their souls. They can fan that spark to bring light, ease wounds, and unleash the fury of the heavens.

Aasimar can arise among any population of mortals. They resemble their parents, but they live for up to 160 years and often have features that hint at their celestial heritage. These often begin subtle and become more obvious when the aasimar gains the ability to reveal their full celestial nature. 

Aasimar bear within their souls the light of the heavens. They are descended from humans with a touch of the power of Mount Celestia, the divine realm of many lawful good deities. Aasimar are born to serve as champions of the gods, their births hailed as blessed events. They are a people of otherworldly visages, with luminous features that reveal their celestial heritage.

An aasimar, except for one who has turned to evil, has a link to an angelic being. That being ‚Äì usually a deva ‚Äì provides guidance to the aasimar, though this connection functions only in dreams. As such, the guidance is not a direct command or a simple spoken word. Instead, the aasimar receives visions, prophecies, and feelings.

Protector aasimar are charged by the powers of good to guard the weak, to strike at evil wherever it arises, and to stand vigilant against the darkness. From a young age, a protector aasimar receives advice and directives that urge to stand against evil.

Scourge aasimar are imbued with a divine energy that blazes intensely within them. It feeds a powerful desire to destroy evil - a desire that is, at its best, unflinching and, at its worst, all-consuming. Many scourge aasimar wear masks to block out the world and focus on containing this power, unmasking themselves only in battle.

An aasimar who was touched by dark powers as a youth or who turns to evil in early adulthood can become one of the fallen - a group of aasimar whose inner light has been replaced by shadow.
